owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.account: The account that will be leveraged.
params.assets: The amount of assets that will be added to the principal.

params.amountIn: The exact amount of `assetIn` to be swapped.
params.assetIn: The address of the token to be swapped.
params.assetOut: The address of the token to receive.
params.fee: The fee of the pool that will be used to swap the assets.

params.amountOut: The exact amount of `amountOut` to be swapped.
params.assetIn: The address of the token to be swapped.
params.assetOut: The address of the token to receive.
params.fee: The fee of the pool that will be used to swap the assets.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.fee: The fee of the pool to be added.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MAX_SQRT_RATIO.details: The maximum value that can be returned from #getSqrtRatioAtTick. Equivalent to getSqrtRatioAtTick(MAX_TICK)

MIN_SQRT_RATIO.details: The minimum value that can be returned from #getSqrtRatioAtTick. Equivalent to getSqrtRatioAtTick(MIN_TICK)

debtManager().notice: DebtManager contract to be used to get Auditor, BalancerVault and UniswapV3Factory addresses.

leverage(address,address,address).notice: Returns extended data useful to leverage or deleverage an account principal position.

poolFees(address,address).notice: Mapping of Uniswap pools to their respective pool fee.

previewDeposit(address,address,address,u.notice: Returns the maximum ratio that an account can leverage its principal plus `assets` amount.

previewInputSwap(address,address,uint256.notice: Returns the output received for a given exact amount of a single pool swap.

previewOutputSwap(address,address,uint25.notice: Returns the input for an exact amount out of a single pool swap.

setPoolFee((address,address),uint24).notice: Sets a pool fee to the mapping of pool fees.

uniswapV3Quoter().notice: Quoter contract to be used to preview the amount of assets to be swapped.

userdoc.notice: Contract to be consumed by Exactly's front-end dApp as a helper for `DebtManager`.
